Package com.authenticket.authenticket.controller

Class SectionController

java.lang.Object
com.authenticket.authenticket.service.Utility
com.authenticket.authenticket.controller.SectionController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins={"${authenticket.frontend-production-url}","${authenticket.frontend-dev-url}","${authenticket.loadbalancer-url}"}, methods={GET,POST}, allowedHeaders={"Authorization","Cache-Control","Content-Type"}, allowCredentials="true") @RequestMapping("/api/v2/section") public class SectionController extends Utility
This is the section controller class and the base path for this controller's endpoint is api/v2/section.

  • Method Details

    • test

      @GetMapping("/test") public String test()

    • saveSection

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> saveSection(@RequestParam("sectionId") String sectionId, @RequestParam("venueId") Integer venueId, @RequestParam("catId") Integer catId, @RequestParam("noOfRows") Integer noOfRows, @RequestParam("noOfSeatsPerRow") Integer noOfSeatsPerRow)
      Endpoint for saving a new section associated with a venue and a ticket category.
      Parameters:
      sectionId - The identifier for the section.
      venueId - The identifier of the associated venue.
      catId - The identifier of the associated ticket category.
      noOfRows - The number of rows in the section.
      noOfSeatsPerRow - The number of seats per row in the section.
      Returns:
      A response containing information about the created section.

    • findTicketDetailsBySection

      @PostMapping("/ticket-details") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> findTicketDetailsBySection(@RequestParam("eventId") Integer eventId, @RequestParam("sectionId") String sectionId)
      Endpoint for retrieving ticket details for a section within an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The identifier of the associated event.
      sectionId - The identifier of the section within the venue.
      Returns:
      A response containing ticket details for the specified section.

    • seatMatrix

      @PostMapping("/seat-matrix") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GeneralApiResponse<Object>> seatMatrix(@RequestParam("eventId") Integer eventId, @RequestParam("sectionId") String sectionId)
      Endpoint for generating the seat matrix in the console for a section within an event. Used for testing of seat allocation. Generates a matrix of 1 and 0s where the dimensions are of the seat plan for the section. 0s are the empty seat and 1s are the taken seats.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The identifier of the associated event.
      sectionId - The identifier of the section within the venue.
      Returns:
      A response indicating that the seat matrix method has been called.
